name: Grand Austria Hotel: Hochsaison
description:
Welcome to the best hotel in Vienna, in this Roll & Write, rooms are prepared, guests are accommodated, personnel decisions are made. And wooed the favor of the emperor.

Using familiar mechanics and processes, this is a fast-paced version of the great board game, yet feels different. And encourages you to deviate and start playing again.


     Independent Roll & Write in the tradition of the expert game Grand Austria Hotel
     There are parallels in processes and actions that were already used in the board game
     Erasable player trays
     Processes, tactics and luck invites you to play again
